entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning with 30 percent chance of flurries late this morning and this afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this afternoon. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 06:43 AM MST Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 33. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 06:43 AM MST Wednesday 15 March 2023
